items.text: yorker just outside off, and the batsman can't get bat to ball
items.shortText: Paul to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: slashes and slashes hard! That cliche best describes this shot. Full outside off, but his hard followthrough of the bat takes the shot past the keeper's right for four
items.shortText: Paul to Mashrafe Mortaza, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off, and he drills a drive to Paul. Stopped by him, but they still manage to steal a single
full and wide outside off, and Mahmudullah tries to chase at it. Attempts to drive over cover, but the outside edge once again takes the ball past the keeper's right
items.postText: Sathyen: "Bangladesh have very nicely set themselves for a 300+ total and have a great opportunity to take something from this trip by winning this game esp. after the hammering in the Tests. Its certainly not going to be easy beating the Windies in T20s so they just can't let this opportunity go."

items.text: yorker just outside off, and he wedges this to short third man. Brings up Bangladesh's 250!
yorker on off, but he manages to drive it down the ground for a single. Partnership of 51 off 37 balls now
reverse pulled again! But Mortaza can't connect. The back of a length delivery goes over his bat and through to the keeper
items.shortText: Holder to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and he swings across the line to deep midwicket for one
good length on leg stump, but going down the leg side
good length outside leg, and he pulls this to fine leg for a single
glanced straight to short third man! Mortaza was making room and Holder followed him. He tries to ramp this short ball over the infield, but the shot doesn't come off the bat's sweet spot

dismissal.text: Mashrafe Mortaza c Gayle b Holder 36 (25b 4x4 1x6) SR: 144.00

items.text: back of a length on leg stump, but going down leg. Not given a wide though as the batsman swiveled in an attempt to pull
items.shortText: Holder to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: low full toss on off, and driven to cover for a single
full outside off, but Sabbir can't lap sweep this away to the leg side. Connects well, but his front leg comes in the ball's way, and it ricochets away to the off side
full outside off, and the drive has been sliced over point to the fielder in the deep
items.postText: Shah Safeer: "Gayle's storm on the way? Or maybe Lewis's? " -- They're definitely due for one this series

items.text: length ball on off, and he dabs this down to third man for a single
full outside off, and he goes for a slog to the leg side. The ball isn't timed well
full outside off, but the slower ball goes under his bat and through to the keeper
starts off with the short ball. Lands on middle, and goes over Sabbir's head
items.shortText: Paul to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: yorker on leg, and he nudges this fine for a single. Wants two, but they change their mind quickly
length ball outside off, and that's been mistimed to point
good length outside off, and he backs away to flat-bat a pull to wide long on
full outside leg stump, but Mahmudullah can't flick it fine. No worries, cause it's a wide anyway
items.postText: Soham Basak: "While Mashrafe played a gem of a knock, it seems a bit unfair to batsmen like Sabbir and Mosaddek, who have to get going from the first ball. If they get out, it will be seen as a failure."

items.text: full on middle, but he comes down the ground and smashes it over long on! Classy way to get to fifty
items.postText: His 19th fifty. The fourth against West Indies

items.text: slower ball outside off, and he clips this away to backward square leg for a single
